subtitle.subtitle: Once upon a time, before your father,
subtitle.translation: Once upon a time, before your father,

subtitle.subtitle: I was seeing a young man.
subtitle.translation: I was seeing a young man.

subtitle.subtitle: But it became very clear he wasn't ready for me,
subtitle.translation: But it became very clear he wasn't ready for me,

subtitle.subtitle: if I was going to wait for him or move on.
subtitle.translation: if I was going to wait for him or move on.

subtitle.subtitle: I don't think I'll ever forget that love I felt.
subtitle.translation: I don't think I'll ever forget that love I felt.

subtitle.subtitle: And if I could do it over again,
subtitle.translation: And if I could do it over again,

subtitle.subtitle: I would still fall in love.
subtitle.translation: I would still fall in love.

subtitle.subtitle: No one can take it away from you.
subtitle.translation: No one can take it away from you.

subtitle.subtitle: -[Stevie] I'm so happy for you. -Thank you.
subtitle.translation: -[Stevie] I'm so happy for you. -Thank you.

subtitle.subtitle: I wanna introduce you to someone please.
subtitle.translation: I wanna introduce you to someone please.
